imdb.title: Rakudai Kishi no Cavalry
imdb.plot: Follow Ikki Kurogane as he defies the odds that everyone thinks he can't do. Ikki is the lowest of the low at his acdemy. While others have magical power and are high ranking. He is the only low ranker... a rank F. At each and eve...

episodes.title: The Worst One I
episodes.plot: After returning to his apartment from jogging, aspiring Mage Knight and flunking Hagun Academy student Ikki Kurogane walks in on a mysterious half-naked girl changing in his room. While being reprimanded and forced to apologize by Academy Director Kurono Shinguuji, Ikki learns that the girl is Stella Vermillion, a famous A-Rank Blazer who is the princess of the Vermillion Empire and his new roommate. When Stella sets up house rules that Ikki cannot agree to, Kurono has them stage a mock battle, with the loser having to obey the winner unconditionally. Ikki agrees to ...

episodes.title: The Worst One II
episodes.plot: Ikki's sister, Shizuku, enrolls in the school and causes quite the commotion upon seeing him. With Shizuku's arrival, Stella learns more about Ikki's history.

episodes.title: The Worst One III
episodes.plot: Shizuku invites Ikki to go shopping, but is annoyed when Stella joins them. Ikki meets Shizuku's roommate, whose device helps the group as they encounter some serious trouble!

episodes.title: The Worst One IV
episodes.plot: During the selection match, Stella, Shizuku, and Alice easily defeat their opponents. Meanwhile, Ikki begins studying Kirihara's Noble Art, which renders him invisible and makes it difficult to even detect him using the other senses. Ikki meets up with Alice and confides in him about him about his match against Kirihara: during the previous school year, when the Kurogane family still had influence over the Academy's superiors, Kirihara had been harassing him with his Device and Ikki refused to fight back, believing it would be used as an excuse to expel him. In the ...

episodes.title: The Experience of the Princess
episodes.plot: Two weeks after his battle with Kirihara, Ikki has progressed through the following matches with ease, quickly losing his school nickname of "The Worst One" and gaining the new nickname of "Another One" and becaming popular with the other students, volunteering to mentor them in perfecting their strength using what he learned about swordsmanship. However, Stella becomes frustrated when Ikki isn't paying enough attention to her during the time since they became a couple. Ikki later takes her, Shizuku, Alice and his followers to the local swimming pool for more training...

episodes.title: Sword Eater I
episodes.plot: Another student wishes to be Ikki's pupil, but doesn't quite know how to ask. Despite her initial awkwardness, Ayatsuji proves to be a hard worker and talented with a sword.

episodes.title: Sword Eater II
episodes.plot: Ikki's impending opponent might be the most difficult one yet. He'll have to rely on his skill and determination to help a friend rediscover their honor.

episodes.title: Sword Eater III
episodes.plot: In an effort to help Ayase and her father, Ikki challenges Kuraudo Kurashiki, a swordsman from Donro Academy with the nickname "Sword Eater".

episodes.title: Princess' Vacation
episodes.plot: The director sends Ikki and Stella to a training camp. Stella was initially excited, believing she was going to spend alone time with Ikki, but it turns out they were sent to help the student council with cleaning up the training field. After cleaning, Stella insists in climbing up the mountains to view the waterfall with Ikki, despite having a fever. Caught in a sudden storm, they take refuge in an abandoned lodge and Stella's soaked clothing leads to an embarrassing situation. Later, they're attacked by a puppet-user Blazer who controls Golems, but the attack is ...

episodes.title: Witch of the Deep Ocean vs Raikiri
episodes.plot: Shizuku's next opponent is none other than the student council president, Toka Todo. In the clash between lightning and water, which blazer will emerge as the victor?

episodes.title: Another One: Uncrowned Sword King I
episodes.plot: An innocent kiss shared in secret becomes the catalyst for a scandal, and Ikki is taken by the ethics committee on counts of "indecent" behavior with the Crimson Princess.

episodes.title: Another One: Uncrowned Sword King II
episodes.plot: Ikki's final match, against Toka Todo, is to be televised to the whole world. Stella and Alice win their final matches and spots at the Seven Stars Battle Festival. Even though exhausted and wounded from his prior matches and ill-treatment in prison and haunted by self-doubt, Ikki arrives at the arena in time, cheered on by everyone at Hagun Academy. Toka Todo, as well as everyone else, knows that the fight is fixed but still wants to test Ikki's resolve to fight for the weak. As the match begins, Ikki uses a new technique called Ittou Rasetsu, which grants Ikki even ...
